amendment.description: An amendment comprised of the following amendments printed in Part B of House Report 116-143 as en bloc No. 5: Nos. 20, 37, 38, 40, 43, 47, 147, 148, 149, 150, 151, 152, 153, 154, 155, 156, 157, 158, 159, 160, 161, 162, 163, 164, and 165.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendments (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A026) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendments en bloc (A026) offered by Mr. Smith (WA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (WA) amendments (A026) Agreed to by voice vote.
